title: SODAR Model-Based Agricultural Education Teacher Readiness Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational agricultural education theories and basic instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening teachers' competencies for applying agricultural education in practice, within self-directed learning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will apply the 5 stages of the SODAR model (Survey, Observe, Decide, Act, Reflect) to agricultural education design
Learners will develop information technology utilization and effective communication strategies tailored to agricultural education contexts
Learners will create practical implementation plans addressing field requirements in agricultural education through the learning design process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
